keyMoments.title: Dadan and Ace Return from Gray Terminal
keyMoments.description: Dadan returns to the hideout with Ace after suffering severe burns from running through the Gray Terminal fire to save him. The Dadan Family tends to her injuries.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the Dadan Family's deep care for Ace and Luffy despite being bandits.

keyMoments.title: Dadan Family Restrains Ace
keyMoments.description: The Dadan Family physically restrains Ace and ties him to a tree to prevent him from attempting to kill the Celestial Dragon responsible for Sabo's death.
keyMoments.significance: The family works together to save Ace's life by preventing his suicidal revenge attempt.

goals: Protecting and raising Luffy and Ace (by Garp's order)
